I am lighting designer: Hey there, my name's Laura! I am a lighting designer and lighting technician currently studying lighting design at the University of the Arts Helsinki. I have several years of hands-on experience working in theatre, live performance, and event production in both design and technical roles.
My background: My background includes lighting design, programming, operating, and assisting in productions ranging from small-scale performances to larger festivals and repertory theatre. I have worked in fast-paced production environments and am used to adapting to different venues, teams, and technical setups.
I have foundational skills: I have foundational skills in GrandMA1/2/3, dot2, and ChamSys MagicQ, and I bring a practical, solution-oriented approach to production work. I am motivated to continue developing my artistic voice alongside strong technical competence.
